text: maryaminre makan masih daivam tanneyenn vadiccavar urappayum satyanisedhikalayirikkunnu. yatharthattil masih parannatitan: "israyel makkale, enreyum ninnaluteyum nathanaya allahuve matram aradhikkuka. allahuvil areyenkilum pankucerkkunnavan allahu svargam nisid'dhamakkum; tircca. avanre vasasthalam narakaman. akramikalkk sahayikaluntavilla.”
